instructions: Tap the hamburger menu in the top left corner. Navigate to Settings . Select General settings . Gmail account settings Android Navigate to the bottom of the page to see Action Confirmations . Select the checkboxes next to each corresponding action. Gmail Action Confirmations

Tap the hamburger menu in the top left corner. Navigate to Settings . Select General settings . Gmail account settings Android Tap on Auto-advance . Select between Newer , Older , or Conversation list . How to use Auto-advance in Gmail

Tap the hamburger menu in the top left corner. Navigate to Settings . Select the Gmail account for which you want to enable an auto response. Gmail account settings In your account settings, navigate to Vacation responder . Toggle the setting to on to start filling out the start and end dates , as well as the body of the message. Tap Done to enable the feature. Gmail out of office enable Android
